about.title: About The India Tours
about.description: The India Tours is a trusted travel company dedicated to creating authentic, memorable, and deeply enriching journeys across India. We specialize in cultural tours, heritage experiences, festivals, weddings, spiritual journeys, and customized travel for both international and Indian travelers. Our goal is to help you discover India not just as a destination, but as a living experience â€” through its people, traditions, stories, and landscapes.
about.missionText: Our mission is to design meaningful and immersive travel experiences that connect travelers with the real essence of India. We believe travel should go beyond sightseeing and become a journey of understanding culture, traditions, and local life while creating lifelong memories.
about.promiseText: We promise honest guidance, transparent pricing, and personalized service at every step. From planning to execution, our experienced team ensures comfort, safety, and attention to detail so you can travel with complete peace of mind.
about.whyText: Expert local knowledge and experienced travel planners, Fully customized tours tailored to your interests and pace, Complete travel services including hotels, transport, guides, and activities, Authentic cultural experiences with local communities, Dedicated support before, during, and after your journey

goldenTriangle.day1: Arrival in Delhi. Pick up from Airport/Railway Station and transfer to hotel. After lunch, explore Old & New Delhi visiting India Gate, Raj Ghat, Jantar Mantar, Presidential Houses, and local markets. Overnight in Delhi.
goldenTriangle.day2: Drive to Agra. Enroute stop at Sikandra to see Emperor Akbarâ€™s mausoleum. Check in to hotel. Visit the breathtaking Taj Mahal in late afternoon, followed by a visit to local marble inlay workshops showcasing traditional craftsmanship. Overnight in Agra.
goldenTriangle.day3: Morning visit to Agra Fort, an imposing red sandstone citadel. Afterward, drive to Jaipur via Fatehpur Sikri, the abandoned Mughal capital, to see the grand Buland Darwaza. Arrive in Jaipur, check in to hotel. Overnight in Jaipur.
goldenTriangle.day4: Full day sightseeing in Jaipur. Visit Amber Fort with optional elephant or jeep ride, City Palace with its museum, Jantar Mantar observatory, Jal Mahal (photo stop), and Hawa Mahal. Immerse in the Pink Cityâ€™s vibrant culture and bazaars. Overnight in Jaipur.
goldenTriangle.day5: Check out after breakfast and transfer to Jaipur Railway Station or Airport for onward journey.

jaipurPushkar.day1: Arrival in Jaipur. Pick up from Delhi airport/railway station and transfer to hotel. After check-in and freshening up, visit City Palace, Chandra Mahal, Shri Govind Deo Temple, and City Palace Museum. Explore Jantar Mantar, the largest stone observatory built by Maharaja Jai Singh. Overnight stay in Jaipur.
jaipurPushkar.day2: Full-day sightseeing in Jaipur. Visit Amber Fort located 11 km from Jaipur. Photo stop at Hawa Mahal. Explore historical attractions and then shop in the vibrant bazaars. Evening drive through the city and visit Laxmi Narayan Mandir. Overnight in Jaipur.
jaipurPushkar.day3: After breakfast, drive to Pushkar via Ajmer (134 km). Visit Ajmer Sharif Dargah en route. On arrival in Pushkar, check-in to hotel. Visit Pushkar Lake and take a holy dip, explore the Brahma Temple and other architectural temples. Evening visit to Rose Garden. Overnight stay in Pushkar.
jaipurPushkar.day4: After breakfast, check out and transfer to Delhi airport/railway station for onward journey.

royalRajasthan.day1: Arrival at Delhi Railway Station/Airport. Meet & Greet and transfer to hotel. Visit Jama Masjid*, Red Fort*, Raj Ghat, Humayunâ€™s Tomb, Rashtrapati Bhawan*, Parliament House*, Jantar Mantar & India Gate. Overnight in Delhi.
royalRajasthan.day2: Half-day sightseeing in Delhi: Qutub Minar, Lotus Temple & India Gate. Drive to Agra (216 km), enroute visit Sikandara (Emperor Akbarâ€™s mausoleum). Check-in at hotel. Overnight in Agra.
royalRajasthan.day3: Visit the Taj Mahal. Drive to Jaipur via Fatehpur Sikri (245 km). Enroute visit Buland Darwaza. Check-in at hotel in Jaipur. Overnight stay.
royalRajasthan.day4: Full day sightseeing in Jaipur: Amber Fort & Palace, Gaitore Cenotaphs (front view), photo stop at Jal Mahal, City Palace & Museum, Jantar Mantar, photo stop at Hawa Mahal. Evening leisure. Overnight in Jaipur.
royalRajasthan.day5: Transfer to Bikaner (330 km). Enroute visit Asia's biggest camel breeding farm. Check-in at hotel. Overnight in Bikaner.
royalRajasthan.day6: Half-day sightseeing in Bikaner: Junagarh Fort, Anup Mahal, Gaj Mandir, Sheesh Mahal, Prachina Museum, Lalgarh Palace. Drive to Jaisalmer (333 km). Enroute visit Jaisalmer War Museum. Overnight in Jaisalmer.
royalRajasthan.day7: Full day sightseeing in Jaisalmer: Jaisalmer Fort (Golden Fort), Patwon-ki-Haveli, Nathmal-ki-Haveli, Salim Singh-ki-Haveli, Gadisar Lake. Evening camel ride on Sam Sand Dunes to watch the sunset. Overnight in Jaisalmer.
royalRajasthan.day8: Transfer to Jodhpur (285 km). Check-in at hotel. Overnight in Jodhpur.
royalRajasthan.day9: Half-day sightseeing in Jodhpur: Umaid Bhawan Palace, Mehrangarh Fort, Jaswant Thada. Transfer to Udaipur (260 km). Evening boat tour on Lake Pichola (own cost) to enjoy sunset and city views. Overnight in Udaipur.
royalRajasthan.day10: Udaipur city tour: Fateh Sagar Lake, Maharana Pratap Memorial, photo stop at Nehru Garden, Sehelion-Ki-Bari, Sukhadia Circle (drive pass), Bhartiya Lok Kala Museum, City Palace, Jagdish Temple, Gulab Bagh. Overnight in Udaipur.
royalRajasthan.day11: Drive to Ajmer & Pushkar (287 km). Visit Ajmer Sharif Dargah, Adhai-Din-Ka Jhonpra, Ana Sagar Lake. Explore Pushkar Lake, Brahma Temple and other temples/ghats. Overnight in Ajmer/Pushkar.
royalRajasthan.day12: Check-out and transfer to Jaipur Railway Station/Airport for onward journey.

lehLadakh.day1: Arrive at Leh airport, received by our representative and transfer to hotel. Complete rest on day. Dinner and overnight at hotel in Leh.
lehLadakh.day2: Leh local sightseeing: Hall of Fame (war museum), Spituk Monastery (7 km) founded in 11th century, Pathar Sahib Gurudwara, Magnetic Hill, and Sangam (confluence of Indus & Zanskar rivers, 35 km). Dinner and overnight at hotel in Leh.
lehLadakh.day3: Early breakfast and drive to Pangong Lake (14,500 ft) via Changla Pass (17,350 ft). Enjoy stunning views of this blue brackish saltwater lake, approx. 134 km long and 5-6 km wide, with 75% across the Indo-China border. Packed lunch optional. Return to Leh via same route. Dinner and overnight at hotel in Leh.
lehLadakh.day4: Visit Shey Palace, Thiksey Monastery, and Hemis Monastery (15thâ€“17th century). Explore murals, frescoes, and statues inside main temples. Return to Leh. Dinner and overnight at hotel.
lehLadakh.day5: Early morning transfer to Leh Airport for onward journey.

delhiAgra.day1: Arrival at Delhi airport. Pickup and transfer to hotel. Full-day sightseeing of Delhi covering Raj Ghat, Humayunâ€™s Tomb, Lotus Temple (Bahai), Qutub Minar, Rashtrapati Bhawan*, Parliament House*, Jantar Mantar & India Gate. Overnight stay in Delhi.
delhiAgra.day2: After breakfast, drive to Agra via Mathura and Vrindavan. Check-in at hotel. Visit the world-famous Taj Mahal, built by Shah Jahan for Mumtaz Mahal. Overnight stay in Agra.
delhiAgra.day3: After breakfast, visit Agra Fort. Later, proceed to Delhi airport for onward journey.

diwaliCultural.day1: Arrival at the airport followed by a warm welcome by our representative and transfer to the hotel. Check-in and relax. Later enjoy lunch or dinner at the hotel or a local restaurant. Proceed for local city sightseeing, exploring famous landmarks, local markets, and beautifully decorated streets glowing with Diwali lights. Return to hotel. Overnight stay.
diwaliCultural.day2: After breakfast, experience a memorable Diwali celebration with a local Indian family. Participate in traditional Diwali rituals, lighting diyas, festive decorations, and cultural interactions. Enjoy all meals â€” breakfast, lunch, and dinner â€” with the host family, featuring authentic home-cooked festive food and traditional sweets. Overnight stay at the hotel.
diwaliCultural.day3: After breakfast, check out from the hotel and transfer to the airport for your onward journey, carrying unforgettable memories of Diwali celebrations in India.

holiCultural.day1: Upon arrival at the airport, our representative will warmly welcome you and assist with your transfer to the hotel. After check-in, take some time to relax and freshen up. Later, enjoy a delicious lunch or dinner at the hotel or a selected local restaurant (as per arrival time). In the evening, proceed for local city sightseeing, where you will explore major attractions, local markets, and colorful streets preparing for the Holi festival. Experience the festive atmosphere and vibrant culture of the city. After sightseeing, return to the hotel. Overnight stay at the hotel.
holiCultural.day2: After breakfast, prepare for a joyful and culturally enriching day. Today you will celebrate Holi with a local Indian family, offering an authentic glimpse into Indian traditions. The experience includes playing Holi with organic & safe colors, traditional Holi songs and joyful celebrations, understanding the cultural significance of Holi, and interaction with the host family in a warm, friendly environment. All meals â€” breakfast, lunch, and dinner â€” will be enjoyed with the local Indian family. Savor traditional Holi delicacies such as gujiya, thandai, festive snacks, and freshly prepared home-cooked meals. After the celebration, return to the hotel to relax and refresh. Overnight stay at the hotel.
holiCultural.day3: After breakfast at the hotel, check out and proceed towards the airport for your onward journey, carrying colorful memories and unforgettable experiences of celebrating Holi in India.

royalWedding.day1:
Arrival â€“ Leisure â€“ Traditional Dinner:

Upon arrival at the airport, you will be warmly welcomed by our representative and transferred to your hotel. After check-in, the rest of the day is kept free for relaxation after your journey.

If time permits, you may enjoy optional local sightseeing, exploring nearby attractions or markets at a relaxed pace.
In the evening, enjoy a delightful dinner at a traditional Indian restaurant, offering a perfect introduction to authentic local flavors.

Overnight stay at the hotel.
royalWedding.day2:
City Sightseeing & Wedding Attire Shopping:

After breakfast, the day is dedicated to the Wedding Mandap ceremony, where you will witness traditional rituals and preparations that form the foundation of an Indian wedding.

Enjoy authentic local wedding-style food throughout the day, including:

Breakfast

Lunch

Dinner

Experience the warmth, spirituality, and customs that make Indian weddings deeply meaningful.

Overnight stay at the hotel.
royalWedding.day4:
Haldi, Mehndi & Sangeet Celebration:

After breakfast, immerse yourself in the most colorful and joyful pre-wedding celebrations.

Todayâ€™s experiences include:

Haldi ceremony with traditional rituals

Mehndi (henna) application with beautiful designs

Sangeet evening with music, dance, and cultural performances

All meals â€” Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner â€” will be traditional wedding-style food prepared locally.

This day is filled with laughter, colors, music, and cultural bonding.

Overnight stay at the hotel.
royalWedding.day5:
Main Wedding Ceremony:

After breakfast, get ready for the most important and grand day of the tour â€” the Main Wedding Ceremony.

Witness the full traditional Indian wedding rituals, vibrant decorations, cultural customs, and emotional moments that define an authentic Indian marriage.

Enjoy complete wedding cuisine throughout the day:

Breakfast

Lunch

Dinner

The day offers an unforgettable cultural experience filled with joy, traditions, and celebration.

Overnight stay at the hotel.
royalWedding.day6:
Bidai & Post-Wedding Rituals:

After breakfast, take part in the Bidai ceremony, a deeply emotional and traditional farewell ritual. Later, witness and experience post-wedding customs and rituals, giving you insight into the cultural significance after marriage.

All meals â€” Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner â€” will again be traditional local wedding food, allowing you to continue enjoying authentic flavors.

The day is calmer, reflective, and culturally enriching.

Overnight stay at the hotel.
royalWedding.day7:
Leisure â€“ Market Visit â€“ Departure:

After breakfast at the hotel, enjoy some leisure time to relax. Later, proceed for a local market visit to shop for souvenirs, handicrafts, and memorable keepsakes.

If time permits, enjoy short sightseeing around the city.
Afterward, you will be transferred to the airport for your onward journey, carrying unforgettable memories of a complete Indian wedding experience.

incredibleIndia.day1:
Delhi â€“ Arrival & Sightseeing:
Arrive at Delhi airport and meet your representative for transfer to the hotel. After check-in, enjoy breakfast at the hotel. Begin sightseeing with visits to Red Fort, Jama Masjid, and Raj Ghat. Explore India Gate and Parliament House in New Delhi. Optionally, stroll through Connaught Place for shopping. Lunch and dinner at recommended local restaurants. Overnight stay at Delhi hotel.
incredibleIndia.day2:
Delhi â†’ Udaipur:
After breakfast, take a flight or train to Udaipur. Arrive and check in at the hotel. Enjoy lunch at a lakeside restaurant. Visit City Palace, Jag Mandir, and Saheliyon Ki Bari. Enjoy a boat ride on Lake Pichola in the evening. Dinner at a local restaurant. Overnight stay at Udaipur hotel.
incredibleIndia.day3:
Udaipur â†’ Pushkar â†’ Jaipur:
After breakfast, drive to Pushkar. Visit Pushkar Lake, Brahma Temple, and local markets. Lunch at a local restaurant in Pushkar. Continue drive to Jaipur and check in at the hotel. Dinner at a traditional restaurant. Overnight stay at Jaipur hotel.
incredibleIndia.day4:
Jaipur â†’ Abhaneri â†’ Agra:
After breakfast, drive to Abhaneri to visit Chand Baori step well. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Continue drive to Agra and check in at the hotel. Dinner at a recommended restaurant. Overnight stay at Agra hotel.
incredibleIndia.day5:
Agra â†’ Orchha â†’ Khajuraho:
After breakfast, visit Taj Mahal and Agra Fort. Lunch at a local restaurant. Drive to Orchha and explore Orchha Fort Complex with its temples and palaces. Continue to Khajuraho. Dinner and overnight stay at Khajuraho hotel.
incredibleIndia.day6:
Khajuraho â†’ Varanasi:
After breakfast, visit Khajuraho Temples, famous for intricate carvings and UNESCO heritage. Lunch at a local restaurant. Fly or take train to Varanasi. Check in at the hotel and attend the evening Ganga Aarti at Dashashwamedh Ghat. Dinner at a local restaurant. Overnight stay at Varanasi hotel.
incredibleIndia.day7:
Varanasi â€“ Departure:
After breakfast, enjoy an optional early morning boat ride on the Ganges to witness sunrise rituals. Visit Sarnath if time permits. Lunch at a recommended restaurant. Free time for shopping or leisure. Transfer to Varanasi airport for onward journey.
